title: Il Davide perseguitato David persecuted / vvritten in Italian by the Marquesse Virgilio Malvezzi ; and done into English by Robert Ashley, Gent.
author: Malvezzi, Virgilio, marchese, 1595-1653.
notes: Includes engraved frontispiece portrait of King David signed: W. Marshall sculpsit.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
